org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.topn

Class ItemSelectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.metrics.topn.ItemSelectors

  • public final class ItemSelectors
extends Object
    Class providing various item selectors.

    • Method Detail

      • allItems

        public static ItemSelector allItems()
        Item selector that selects all items.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the universe of items.

      • testItems

        public static ItemSelector testItems()
        Item selector that selects test items.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items from the user's test set.

      • trainingItems

        public static ItemSelector trainingItems()
        Item selector that selects training items.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items from the user's training set.

      • testRatingMatches

        public static ItemSelector testRatingMatches(org.hamcrest.Matcher<Double> matcher)
        Select items where the user's test rating matches a condition. For example, using the matcher Matchers.greaterThanOrEqualTo(Comparable) will select items that the user has rated at least a particular value.
        Parameters:
        matcher - The matcher for test ratings.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects items with matching test ratings.

      • allItemsExcept

        public static ItemSelector allItemsExcept(ItemSelector base)

      • addNRandom

        public static ItemSelector addNRandom(ItemSelector base,
                                      int nRandom)
        Select items selected by a selector, plus additional randomly-selected items.
        Parameters:
        base - The base selector (e.g. testItems()).
        nRandom - The number of random items to add.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects the items selected by base plus an additional nRandom items.

      • randomSubset

        public static ItemSelector randomSubset(ItemSelector base,
                                        int n)
        Randomly select items selected by another selector.
        Parameters:
        base - The base selector (e.g. allItems()).
        n - The number of random items to select.
        Returns:
        An item selector that selects n items from the items selected by base, or simply the items selected by base if there are fewer then n items selected.

      • nRandom

        public static ItemSelector nRandom(int n)
        Randomly selects items from the universe. Short for ItemSelectors.randomSubset(ItemSelectors.allItems, n)

      • mostPopular

        public static ItemSelector mostPopular(int n)
        Select the most popular items.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of items to select.
        Returns:
        A selector factory that will select the n items with the most events.

      • setDifference

        public static ItemSelector setDifference(ItemSelector selectorToKeep,
                                         ItemSelector selectorToNotKeep)
        Selects the set difference between two other selectors
        Parameters:
        selectorToKeep - selects items that are to be kept
        selectorToNotKeep - selects items that are to be excluded
        Returns:
        an item selector which selects every item that is selected by selectorToKeep and not selected by selectorToNotKeep.

      • union

        public static ItemSelector union(ItemSelector selectorOne,
                                 ItemSelector selectorTwo)
        selects any items selected by at least one of two other selectors.

      • fixed

        public static ItemSelector fixed(Collection<Long> items)
        Select a fixed collection of items.
        Parameters:
        items - The set of items. to select.
        Returns:
        A selector that selects items.

      • fixed

        public static ItemSelector fixed(long... items)
        Select a fixed collection of items.
        Parameters:
        items - The items to select.
        Returns:
        A selector that selects items.
